summary: TOYOTA WARRANTY ENHANCEMENT  PROGRAM (ZE7) PHASE 2: 2006 - 2008 MY RAV4 WARRANTY POLICY BULLETIN POL 14-12 12/16/14  DUE TO EXCESSIVE OIL CONSUMPTION.
